results.name: a(0) = 1; for n > 0, a(n) = largest prime factor of 7^n-1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..378 (terms 0..80 from Vincenzo Librandi)
formula: a(n) = A006530(A024075(n)) for n >= 1. - _Michel Marcus_, Dec 16 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 26 2002
